item.title: Subquery operators
item.description: Subquery always returns an array of values: > db.mainColl.find() { "_id" : ObjectId("5f50ff25a91e9a0445274046"), "item" : "valueTwo" } > db.subqueryColl.find() { "_id" : ObjectId("5f50fe95a91e9a0445274044"), "something" : "valueOne" } { "_id" : ObjectId("5f50fe9ca91e9a0445274045"), "something" : "valueTwo" } > db.mainColl.aggregate( ... [ ... { ... "$project" : { ... "example" : { ... "$query" : { ... "$ns" : "subqueryColl", ... "$q" : { }, ... "$p" : "something" ... } ... } .

item.title: Fuzzy joins
item.description: Fuzzy joins syntax { "$join" : { "$joined" : { "dim" : "dimCollection" }, "$match" : { "$fuzzy" : { "anyNameWorksHere" : { "$expr" : { "$regex" : [ "$factField", "$dim.$dimField" ] } } } }, "$project" : { "fact" : "$$ROOT", "dim" : "$dim.$*", "anyNameWorksHere" : "$$anyNameWorksHere" } } } Example data > db.factCollection.find() { "_id" : ObjectId("5f4b5ab953ce805278e48b21"), "factField" : "string" } { "_id" : ObjectId("5f4b5ae453ce805278e48b22"), "factField" : "longerstring" } > db.
